name: A Jedi's Patience (V)
Lore: 'Early on in his duel with Vader, Luke took his time in trying to sense his opponent''s weaknesses.',
Text: 'USED: If a captive on table, activate 2 Force.LOST: Once per game, if a Dark Jedi present with a Skywalker (except Shmi), even as a non-frozen captive, they duel. Both players draw 2 destiny; add ability. Higher total wins. For remainder of turn, winner is immune to attrition and the loser may not move.(Original concept by Tom Plis - Chicago V-Lite 2006)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
